name: Row Grab
description:
Welcome to Row Grab!

3 pieces in a row equals a point;  4-in-a-row scores 2.

The game ends when the player who is supposed to play has no further pieces to play.

The piece you play sets the valid moves for the other player. If the other player has no valid moves, their turn skips and  you can play in any open square.

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

Row Grab is built using the LÖVE2d framework.
It is inspired by the game Mijnlieff.
All emojis designed by OpenMoji – the open-source emoji and icon project. License: CC BY-SA 4.0.
